price: 276. Allah zal de rente verwoesten en zal daden van liefdadigheid doen toenemen. En Allah houdt niet van de ongelovigen, de zondaren.
arabic: يَمۡحَقُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلرِّبَوٰاْ وَيُرۡبِي ٱلصَّدَقَٰتِۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ أَثِيمٍ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: yamḥaqu al-lahu al-riba wayur'bī al-ṣadaqāti wal-lahu lā yuḥibbu kulla kaffārin athīmin
